name: 45 MINUTES of HEAVY PLANE SPOTTING! Tokyo-Narita International Airport (2015)
description:
Way back in March of 2015, I visited Japan for the first time, and spent an afternoon at the observation deck at Tokyo-Narita International Airport!

I recently rediscovered this footage on an old hard drive, and realized how many of the aircraft I caught just aren't around anymore.

Although the camera work is a bit dodgy and that 2015 me had no concept of backlighting, I think some of these catches have aged really well - tons of now-retired 747s, A340s, 767s, and much more! Hope you all enjoy.
